comment: Just enough info without clutteing the screen. Works perfect on Nixon mission. Only thing is I have no idea what the percentage number is below the weather

author: Bronze Factory Productions
comment: Just bought it. Looks great, but on Android Wear app on phone it says ERROR & keeps crashing. On the watch, I can't get the weather icon or updates on screen, so all I have it's the steps widget. Some other tech probs too, such as not all colour changes take place or even add the widget. Not really happy. Only this watch face from this Dev is problematic. Please fix these probs devs. (LG Urban 1st Gen with OS 2.0)

reply.author: Wearable Designs
reply.content: Hello.  We're just in the process of beta testing an update to this watch face which updates it for Wear 2.0.  Menus have been been rewritten and the weather fetcher improved.  If you would like to be part of the beta, please send us an email to support@wearabledesigns.co.uk and we can add you in.
